title: ConfigSnapshot
content:

name: ConfigSnapshot
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  A snapshot of configuration values at a given version. Can be player-specific.
description: |
  An object with the configuration values at a specific version. A snapshot can
  be targeted to a single player to apply experimentation values. This is
  returned by Class.ConfigService:GetConfigAsync() and
  Class.ConfigService:GetConfigForPlayerAsync().

  For more information, see
  Experience configs.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - Object
descendants: []
tags:
  - NotCreatable
  - NotReplicated
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: ConfigSnapshot.Error
    summary: |
      Populated if snapshot was in an error state.
    description: |
      Populated if snapshot was in an error state.
    codesamples: []
    type: ConfigSnapshotErrorState
    tags:
      - ReadOnly
      - NotReplicated
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: false
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Basic
  - name: ConfigSnapshot.Outdated
    summary: |
      If true, indicates the snapshot is outdated and can be refreshed to newer
      values.
    description: |
      If true, indicates the snapshot is outdated and can be refreshed to newer
      values.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
    tags:
      - ReadOnly
      - NotReplicated
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: false
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Basic
methods:
  - name: ConfigSnapshot:GetValue
    summary: |
      Returns the value for the given key.
    description: |
      Returns the value for the provided key in the snapshot.
    codesamples: []
    parameters:
      - name: key
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          Key of the configuration to get the value for.
    returns:
      - type: Variant
        summary: |
          The value of the configuration for the given key.
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Basic
  - name: ConfigSnapshot:GetValueChangedSignal
    summary: |
      Returns a signal that fires when the value for the given key changes due
      to a refresh.
    description: |
      Returns a signal that fires when the value for the provided key changes
      after calling Class.ConfigSnapshot:Refresh().
    codesamples: []
    parameters:
      - name: key
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          Key of the configuration to get the change signal for.
    returns:
      - type: RBXScriptSignal
        summary: |
          A DataType.RBXScriptSignal that fires when the value for the given
          key changes upon refresh.
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Basic
  - name: ConfigSnapshot:Refresh
    summary: |
      Refreshes the snapshot to the latest configuration values.
    description: |
      Refreshes the snapshot to the latest configuration values from the
      service. If not called, the snapshot will continue to reflect the values
      at the time it was created or last refreshed.
    codesamples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: ()
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Basic
events:
  - name: ConfigSnapshot.UpdateAvailable
    summary: |
      Fires when a newer version of the configuration is available.
    description: |
      Fires when a newer version of the configuration is available than the
      current snapshot. You can perform validation and/or call
      Class.ConfigSnapshot:Refresh() to update to the latest values.
    codesamples: []
    parameters: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    capabilities:
      - Basic
